dmca.title: [EV1-C1355131R] ICC Champions Trophy 2006 and other infringements
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Friday, October 13, 2006 5:42 PM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [EV1-C1355131R] ICC Champions Trophy 2006 and other infringements Subject: [EV1-C1355131R] ICC Champions Trophy 2006 and other infringements ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. ICC Champions Trophy 2006 and other infringements Added by system at Friday, Oct 13 2006 09:40 pm X-MailFrom: legal@willow.tv X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [70.87.6.110] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Fri Oct 13 22:38:17 2006 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Fri, 13 Oct 2006 22:36:51 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Fri, 13 Oct 2006 22:36:51 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from legal@willow.tv) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1GYaKQ-0001SD-QE; Fri, 13 Oct 2006 22:36:50 -0500 Received: from smtp.e-agency.com ([209.209.82.140]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from legal@willow.tv) with esmtp (Exim) id 1GYaKP-000Kgb-58; Fri, 13 Oct 2006 22:36:49 -0500 Received: from newmad (c-67-188-86-171.hsd1.ca.comcast.net [67.188.86.171]) by smtp.e-agency.com (Postfix) with ESMTP id AFF7FA63D; Fri, 13 Oct 2006 20:36:46 -0700 (PDT) Reply-To: From: "Nandan Kamath" To: , Subject: ICC Champions Trophy 2006 and other infringements Date: Fri, 13 Oct 2006 20:36:44 -0700 Organization: Willow TV Message-ID: <001401c6ef41$f8c23e30$6400a8c0@newmad> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0015_01C6EF07.4C636630" X-Priority: 3 (Normal) X-MSMail-Priority: Normal X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook, Build 10.0.2627 Importance: Normal X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2962 Received-SPF: none (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: 209.209.82.140 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of willow.tv) client-ip=209.209.82.140; envelope-from=legal@willow.tv; helo=smtp.e-agency.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 14 Oct 2006 03:36:51.0114 (UTC) FILETIME=[FC4830A0:01C6EF41] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Dear Sirs, We write on behalf of Willow TV, Inc. ("Willow") and EchoStar Satellite L.L.C. ("EchoStar") the exclusive broadband/Internet rights holder for USA, Mexico, Canada and the Caribbean for the 2006 ICC Champions Trophy Cricket Tournament (the "Series"). We have noticed that a website hosted by you, http://www.dctorrent.com (IP address 74.52.26.74), is displaying Audio Visual (A/V) content from the above Series and from other cricket events for which we hold exclusive rights. As you are aware, you've engaged in such display without obtaining authority or authorization from EchoStar or Willow to do so. Please be advised that your unauthorized use of EchoStar's intellectual property constitutes an infringement of EchoStar's exclusive copyrights. Please immediately cease all such infringing activities on any and all of your web sites (and elsewhere) and confirm to us via email that you have done so. Nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to constitute an express or implied waiver of any of Willow's or EchoStar's rights or remedies, all of which are expressly reserved. Formal Declaration I hereby state that EchoStar is the sole owner of the rights referenced above and that Willow is authorized to act on its behalf with respect to internet streaming, internet monitoring and compliance. On behalf of the owner of the exclusive rights with respect to the content at issue in this notice, I hereby state that I have a good faith belief that use of such A/V in the manner complained of is not authorized by the owner, its agent, or the law. I, Nandan Kamath, as a representative of Willow hereby digitally sign this e-mail message under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United States of America with the additional statement under penalty of perjury that the information in the notice is accurate. We thank you for your cooperation. Yours sincerely, Nandan Kamath Willow TV, Inc. 1289 Anvilwood Avenue Sunnyvale, CA 94089 USA legal@willow.tv Please note, if this email has been sent to the wrong recipient, pleaseaccept our apologies, inform us of the error, and forward this e-mail immediately to the correct person or department for action. MIME element (text/html)

 

Dear Sirs,

 

We write on behalf of Willow TV, Inc. ("Willow") and EchoStar Satellite L.L.C. ("EchoStar") the exclusive broadband/Internet rights holder for USA, Mexico, Canada and the Caribbean for the 2006 ICC Champions Trophy Cricket Tournament (the "Series").

 

We have noticed that a website hosted by you, http://www.dctorrent.com (IP address 74.52.26.74), is displaying Audio Visual (A/V) content from the above Series and from other cricket events for which we hold exclusive rights. As you are aware, you've engaged in such display without obtaining authority or authorization from EchoStar or Willow to do so. Please be advised that your unauthorized use of EchoStar's intellectual property constitutes an infringement of EchoStar's exclusive copyrights.  Please immediately cease all such infringing activities on any and all of your web sites (and elsewhere) and confirm to us via email that you have done so.

 

Nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to constitute an express or implied waiver of any of Willow’s or EchoStar's rights or remedies, all of which are expressly reserved.

 

Formal Declaration

 

I hereby state that EchoStar is the sole owner of the rights referenced above and that Willow is authorized to act on its behalf with respect to internet streaming, internet monitoring and compliance.

 

On behalf of the owner of the exclusive rights with respect to the content at issue in this notice, I hereby state that I have a good faith belief that use of such A/V in the manner complained of is not authorized by the owner, its agent, or the law.

 

I, Nandan Kamath, as a representative of Willow hereby digitally sign this e-mail message under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United States of America with the additional statement under penalty of perjury that the information in the notice is accurate.

 

We thank you for your cooperation.

 

Yours sincerely,

 

 

 

Nandan Kamath

 

Willow TV, Inc.

1289 Anvilwood Avenue

Sunnyvale, CA< font size=2 face=Arial> 94089

USA

legal@willow.tv

 

Please note, if this email has been sent to the wrong recipient, pleaseaccept our apologies, inform us of the error, and forward this e-mail immediately to the correct person or department for action.

 

 

 

MIME element (text/plain)
